TopicTitle: How do you reach different ranks like Spacecraft Engineer?

Articles.Content: I don\'t know so I started this subject.
I think you just have to post.
I think you get the new ranks at 50, 100, and 250.

I think you get the new ranks at 50, 100, and 250.

And 500 posts

Posts Title

0-49 Bottle Rocketeer

50-99 Rocketry Enthusiast

100-249 Spacecraft Engineer

250-499 Sr. Spacecraft Engineer

500+ Master Rocket Scientist

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
Well I got some ways to go yet...

Well I got some ways to go yet...

Only 111 posts to go!

Only 111 posts to go!

Until senior spacecraft engineer for you that is

I\'m working hard at getting those posts.

One of them came from here! ;p

I\'m working hard at getting those posts.

One of them came from here! ;p

IMA BEAT YOU TO BEING MASTER ROCKET SCIENTIST
Giggle..

Giggle..

ASDHGFSDGHFDGDF I will post more than you.

Just be aware if we find your posting just to increase your count without providing anything substantial to the forums, we just might reset your count to zero. 8)

Hm! I\'ve made some posts I\'m not proud of in retrospect, but mine upthread wasn\'t one I would ever have expected to be deleted. FWIW it was not written in anger or with any attempt at presuming authority.

Thanks for this info.

Couldn\'t find a thing about it in the help section.

Just be aware if we find your posting just to increase your count without providing anything substantial to the forums, we just might reset your count to zero. 8)

Master Rocket Scientist, reporting in!

Just say.... can a mod make a new rank? And if so, make 'True Kerbal,' which you get at 1/0 posts.

And if that happens, can you set me to it? I am tired of being called a Master Rocket Scientist. I am a kerbal! And proud of it! Being called a master of something insults me!

Yep. On another forum like this one, the admins reset the entire system to run on time spent online. Cut down on spam quite a bit.

Awesome, I always like these forum rank thingos, fun stuff

There should be higher levels tho, like maybe every 500 up to 5,000 should be different, just for some variety. I know 5000 seems to be a lot, but I see a few members who are already reaching 500-1000, and in a year or two there will be a lot of posts by more active members.

Ive seen on other forums some people surpass 10,000 in a couple of years (maybe they need to get out more), and I know its all somewhat trivial....

....but still!

I know this topic has been dead for some time but this seems like an appropriate place to ask - what does the color coding means? Do you get 'squares' of different color after you filled the bar with previous ones, or you get it in time after registration, or maybe it\'s your function in community?
